titleStmt.title: [E]nglands miraculous preservation emblematically described, erected for a perpetual monument to posterity. By John Leicester.
titleStmt.author: Leicester, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Hancock, and are to be sold, at the entrance to Popes.head [sic] Ally,

notesStmt.note: In verse: "This Ark cal'd Union hath not her Peer" ...
Features engraved portraits of the Earl of Essex; the Earl of Warwick; the Earl of Manchester; General Lesley; Sir Thomas Fairfax; and Oliver Cromwell.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
